content.text:
# Century City station (Chengdu Metro)

| operator         = Chengdu Metro Limited
| line             =
| platforms        = 4 (1 island platform, 2 side platforms)
| connections      =
| structure        =
| accessible       =
| code             =
| opened           = 27 September 2010
| closed           =
| former           =
| passengers       =
| pass_year        =
| services         =
}}
Century City () is a station on Line 1 and Line 18 of the Chengdu Metro in China.
Station layout

|Northbound
|←  towards South Railway Station (Jincheng Plaza East)
